local_intent: Transfer the white plate onto the red_plate: confirm detection, move above, align, lower until contact, verify contact, place centered, open gripper, and retreat.
assumptions: red_plate is detectable from current camera view
space above red_plate is free for descent
contact sensor reports force comparable to '10' units
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT transfer phase: begins by perceiving red_plate, moves above and aligns, performs controlled descent until contact, places the object centered with neutral yaw, opens gripper, and retreats as described in GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION.
